title: Surviving Future Shock in Research
description: My personal takeaways from Toffler’s Future Shock - lessons on how researchers can stay adaptable, maintain focus, and thrive in times of rapid change.

title: Algorithms in Biotech
description: My personal rediscovery of dynamic programming - seeing its practical applications in a fresh, intuitive way.

title: Why PCA Isn’t Enough for Genetics
description: PCA is great for population structure, but it misses the non-linear twists of real genetic variation. Here’s why we need autoencoders and beyond.

title: Heatmaps Are Tricking You
description: Heatmaps look simple. Pretty, even. However, the implications of these displays are often misunderstood.

title: Designing LD-Aware Genome Embeddings: Choices, Constraints, and Trade-offs
description: How LD and cis structure guide genome representation learning.

title: Regularization Isn’t One Thing
description: Regularization demystified: KL vs MMD for meaningful latent spaces.

title: What Is Genetic Data? DNA, RNA, and Why We Measure Them
description: What DNA and RNA data represent.

title: DNA Sequencing Explained: What Does Reading the Genome Mean?
